LanguageData.Make_10xMedifuel_alt.label: make medifuel x10 alt
LanguageData.Make_10xMedifuel_alt.description: An alternative medifuel recipe to produce 10 units at a time.
LanguageData.Make_50xMedifuel_alt.label: make medifuel x50 alt
LanguageData.Make_50xMedifuel_alt.description:
An alternative medifuel recipe to produce 50 units at a time.
The 50x bulk production compared to the 10x alternative recipe, grants : +10% productivity gain -10% ingredient cost.
